name: Edge Of Glory
description:
LEGENDARY RACER!!! You've been climbing up the leaderboard, claiming titles, and beating racers. There's only one thing left for you to do: Beat the legendary BOSS' time on this course! No one has done it in twenty years, think that you have what it takes?

Edge Of Glory is an entry for Vimlark's VimJam2. 

HOW TO PLAY

use A and D OR the arrow keys OR the directional pad on a controller to steer left and right. 

Your car moves forward automatically. 

Hold the Space key OR the Enter key OR the A button on an Xbox controller to use your car's brakes.

Press the Control key OR the Y button on an Xbox controller to reset.

Press the Tab key OR the Select button on a controller to switch fullscreen.

Press the T key OR the Start button on a controller to switch between the two levels.

SHILLS

Follow me on Twitter @C00lGirlJanetrd for some sick Kamen Rider content and any other game jams I enter and also follow @AscendedGame on Twitter for updates on my sick awesome game ASCENDED SURVIVOR, DEMO COMING SOON!!!
